sentences.sContent: Education needn't only be about furthering your career.
sentences.sCn: 教育不必只是与推进你的事业有关。

sentences.sContent: He dedicated his life to furthering the cause of world peace.
sentences.sCn: 他一生致力于推动世界和平事业。

sentences.sContent: ...Only in this way can we get the most out of the further education...
...modern students are faced with more alternatives to continue their further education...
...low fossil fuel prices could discourage further innovation in...
...there's various policies that need to be implemented and further implemented in order to make us a tobacco-free society...
...Evidence from Australia suggests plain packaging pushes society further along that road...
...and will suggest plenty of further lines of inquiry...
...And further down the road is biometric authentication...
...One of the ways in which all agents seem to make decisions is that they assign a lower weighting to outcomes that are going to be further away in the future...
...a further increase in farming area without impacting unfavorably on what remains of the world's natural ecosystems appears unlikely...

phrases.pCn: 进一步研究；深造；继续教育，进修
进一步信息；更多的信息；补充信息
进一步做；进一步说；更多地给
延伸阅读；补充书目；进一步的阅读
没有再费周折；立即；干脆痛快

trans.tranOther: to help something progress or be successful
